casebody.data:
Falls Mills Associates, Ltd. v. Lewis C. Maruzo et al. (7209)

Spallone, O’Connell and Foti, Js.

Argued March 17 decision released March 23, 1989 *807John C. Driscoll, with whom, on the brief, was William N. Sebastian, for the appellants (defendants). F. Herbert Gruendel, with whom, on the brief, was Maureen Duggan Regula, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

At oral argument, the parties stipulated, and we agree, that this appeal should be dismissed as moot.

The appeal is dismissed.
